newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Banco Frances started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Banco Frances started.

text.p: -- J.P. Morgan Securities said on Tuesday it had started coverage of Argentina's Banco Frances del Rio de la Plata SA with a buy recommendation.

-- "Banco Frances' strict focus on minimizing risk while achieving above-average profitability should serve it well as the Argentine economy enters what we expect to be a period of gradual strengthening," analyst Brian Pearl wrote in a report.
-- "We rate Banco Frances a BUY with a 12-month price target of $40," or 47 percent above the bank's current American Depositary Receipt price of $27.25.
-- Banco Frances was up 1/4 to 27-1/2 in mid-morning New York trade on Tuesday.
